hero.description: Creating value together by reshaping payments with collaboration. Reduce costs on business transfers and grow your global business.

solutions.label: Core Solutions
solutions.title: Payment Solutions Built for Your Business
solutions.description: Two powerful solutions — SPS and VAS — to handle every aspect of cross-border payments.

sps.title: SPS
sps.subtitle: Seamless Payment Solution
sps.description: 24/7 bulk cross-border payout solution. Manage FX, verify recipients, and process mass payments all in one place.

vas.title: VAS
vas.subtitle: Value Added Services
vas.description: From virtual account issuance to collections on behalf. All the add-on features you need for payment operations.
features: Instant V/A Issuance via API or Portal

accounting.title: Accounting
accounting.description: Easy reconciliation to simplify your accounting. Even complex settlements, handled cleanly.

pob.title: Payment on Behalf
pob.description: High level of transparency and maximum efficiency for proxy payments.

flexibility.title: Flexibility
flexibility.description: Exchange and pay simultaneously, or manage your own FX. Operate the way you want.

dynamic.title: Dynamic
dynamic.description: Choose your payment method, track transactions in real-time, and get instant payment receipts.

netout.title: Netout
netout.description: Lower your cost with funding leverage. No hidden commissions.

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: Micro Service Architecture with embedded AML & verification for a robust, reliable system.

step1.title: SPS + VAS
step1.description: SPS for cross-border payouts, VAS for collections and virtual accounts. Both provided as part of the service.

step2.title: API Integration
step2.description: Connect your system using our API documentation at developers.gmeremit.com.

step3.title: FX & Payment Control
step3.description: Manage your own FX or exchange and pay simultaneously. Track every transaction in real-time.

step4.title: Reconciliation & Reports
step4.description: Easy reconciliation for settlements, instant payment receipts and full transaction history.

cta.title: Get Started with GME Payments
cta.description: Grow your business with global payment solutions. Our dedicated managers will propose the optimal solution for you.

hero.description: Apply for a loan easily with the GME app. We support your life in Korea with fast approvals and flexible terms.

why.title: Why Choose GME Loan?
why.description: We provide tailored loan services for foreign customers in 14+ countries. Experience proven trust with over 1 million successful loans and ₩500 billion+ in cumulative lending.

products.title: Loan Products
products.subtitle: Compare and choose the loan product that fits your needs.

visa_types.label: Eligible Visa Types
visa_types.value: E9, E7, F2, F5, F6, D8 & any visa with Legal Work Contract

step1.title: Apply Through GME App
step1.desc: Download GME App in Google Play Store or App Store. Register and Apply Loan.

step2.title: Requirement Submission
step2.desc: Fill up your information and submit the required documents.

step3.title: Verification
step3.desc: Our staff will verify your documents and check your credit standing.

step4.title: Approval
step4.desc: Once approved, digital contract signing will proceed.

step5.title: Disbursements
step5.desc: After contract signing, loan amount will be deposited to your bank account.

items.q: Which visa holders can apply for a loan?
items.a: Holders of D-2, E-9, E-10, E-7, E-1, E-2, E-3, F-2, F-2R, F-5, F-6, F-4, and G-1 visas are eligible. Available products may vary depending on your visa type.
Only three documents are needed: Alien Registration Card (ARC), Employment Contract, and Passport. No complicated paperwork—just a smooth and simple process.

items.q: How do I apply for a loan?
items.a: You can apply easily through the GME Finance mobile app. With just your smartphone, you can apply for a loan quickly and securely—anytime, anywhere.
GME Finance provides secure handling of personal information through a system specifically designed for foreign customers. You can use our services with confidence.

cta.title: Start Your Loan with GME App Today
cta.description: Get the funds you need quickly with easy mobile application.
